name: Grilled Flank Steak
steps:
Pat the flank steak dry with paper towels.
In a small bowl, mix olive oil, minced garlic, salt, pepper, rosemary, paprika, Worcestershire sauce, and lemon juice to create a marinade.
Place steak in a resealable bag and pour marinade over it. Marinate for at least 2 hours in the refrigerator, or overnight for best results.
Remove steak from marinade and let it come to room temperature for 30 minutes before cooking.
Preheat grill to high heat (500Â°F) or heat a cast-iron pan over high heat.
Grill steak for 4-5 minutes per side for medium-rare, or adjust time based on desired doneness.
Let steak rest for 5-10 minutes before slicing against the grain.
Slice into thin strips and serve immediately.
